sentences.english: Methods Experimental asthma model of guinea pigs was induced by ovalbumin in vivo.
sentences.chinese: 方法以卵白蛋白致敏豚鼠制备哮喘模型。

sentences.english: This paper is concerned with strain measurement in central cross-section of cavia porcellus humerus in vivo.
sentences.chinese: 对豚鼠左前肢肱骨中央截面进行在体应交测量。

sentences.english: The result of guinea-pig skin sensitizing test showed weak sensitizing effect.
sentences.chinese: 豚鼠皮肤致敏试验结果属弱致敏性。

sentences.english: Objective To observe the pathomorphological characteristics of acute bromadiolone poisoning in guinea pigs.
sentences.chinese: 目的观察豚鼠食人溴敌隆急性中毒的病理形态学特点。

sentences.english: At detecting T lymphocytes of animal, the red cells of sev…
sentences.chinese: 豚鼠淋巴细胞与兔红细胞结合率高。

sentences.english: METHODS The oxygen consumption of live cells of guinea pig was measured by Warburg instrument.
sentences.chinese: 方法应用微量呼吸检压仪测定豚鼠肝细胞耗氧量。

sentences.english: OBJECTIVE To study the therapeutic effects of Tongbi capsule on allergic rhinitis in guinea pigs.
sentences.chinese: 探讨通鼻胶囊对豚鼠变态反应性鼻炎的抑制作用。

sentences.english: Anne, have you ever seen the movie G-Force?
sentences.chinese: 安妮，你看过豚鼠特工队吗？

sentences.english: Claim it is very harsh on cavies .
sentences.chinese: 要求是非常苛刻的豚鼠。

sentences.english: CONCLUSION Tongbi capsule has inhibitory action on allergic rhinitis.
sentences.chinese: 通鼻胶囊对豚鼠变态反应性鼻炎有一定的抑制作用。

sentences.english: Cavies need space to walk or run around.
sentences.chinese: 豚鼠需要空间，以步行或运行。

sentences.english: ConclusionElectrocardiogram can be used as a judgment index with Cortex Periplocae poisoning in guinea pigs.
sentences.chinese: 结论豚鼠心电图可以作为香加皮中毒的判断依据。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the effect of hyperbaric therapy on endolymphatic hydrops in guinea pigs.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨中耳加压治疗是否可抑制豚鼠内淋巴积水。

sentences.english: Lily: Anne, have you ever seen the movie G-Force?
sentences.chinese: 安妮，你看过豚鼠特工队吗？

sentences.english: Here the other guinea-pig cheered, and was suppressed.
sentences.chinese: 这时，又一只豚鼠喝起彩来，又被制止了。

sentences.english: Objectives: To explore the mechanism and the dose-effect relationship of Fongchuan Mixture on guinea-pigs with asthma.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨防喘合剂对哮喘豚鼠的作用机制及量效关系。

definition: Garfield (comic strip cat created by Jim Davis)
